attributes.additional_details:
DaveDinners is a food enthusiast, producing some of the finest combinations of Cherry Coke & Meat, Exotic Sauces & Poultry, and a well presented deserts.

Sometimes you look at these mouth-watering dinners/desserts and wonder to yourself, how can this be done? I know they say a real magician never reveals his secrets but there needs to be a line and Dave has crossed it.

If you too believe that a DaveDIY video should be created then please sign this e-petition and allow me to stop force feeding the children with rice pudding and warm milk!
